item.title: Devin Haney Vs. Brian Norman Jr. Results: Highlights And Scorecards
item.description: Devin Haney becomes the new WBO welterweight champion after a knockdown-filled win over Brian Norman Jr., setting up potential future clashes in 2026.

item.title: Live-Action ‘Gundam’ Movie Eyes New Star Amid Worrying Story Outline
item.description: Back in April, Sydney Sweeney was attached to star in the live-action 'Gundam' movie, and now Noah Centineo is in talks to be her co-star.
